---
agent: agent
---

Add support for installing a new django package to djdevx.


Follow the instructions in [copilot instructions](../copilot-instructions.md) for code standards and best practices. Also consult the [django package skill](SKILL.md) for specific instructions on how to add a new django package to djdevx. After adding the new package, ensure to write tests for it and run them using the [tester skill](../tester/SKILL.md) to ensure everything works as expected.
